verbose_text: In this study conducted, Naghizadeh et al. measured the exposure range of total dust and crystalline silica levels in iron ore open-pit mines of eastern Iran as 8.28-800.00 mg/m 3 and 0.012-26.11 mg/m 3 respectively; whereas the respirable dust and silica were reportedly between 5.26-66.14 mg/m 3 and 0.01-1.48 mg/m 3, respectively [XREF_BIBR].
